com.vector.cfg.dom.com.model.groovy

Interface ICommunicationApiEntryPoint


  • @PublishedApi(value=ADDITIONS_ALLOWED)
 @PublishedApiDomain(value=AUTOMATION_IF)
public interface ICommunicationApiEntryPoint
    ICommunicationApiEntryPoint is the entry point for accessing the communication domain interfaces.
    The communication domain API is specifically designed to support communication related use cases. It is available from the IDomainApi in the form of the ICommunicationApi interface.

    (c) Copyright Vctr Informatik GmbH. All Rights Reserved.
